attributes.action: urge the Bank of Enland to consider house price inflation outside the London area when setting interest rates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bank of England has pointed to fast rising house prices as one reason for raising interest rates, though this may be true in some areas like London; in my area the East Midlands property prices have risen less than 8% in the last two and a half years, indicating that the housing boom seems to be over.
Therefore higher interst rates may not be appropriate for all of the UK
